alert.note: Alert for Churchill; Lyon; Pershing; Washoe (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued August 18 at 5:03PM PDT until August 18 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: The National Weather Service in Reno has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Northwestern Churchill County in west central Nevada... Southern Washoe County in western Nevada... Southwestern Pershing County in west central Nevada... North central Lyon County in west central Nevada... * Until 700 PM PDT. * At 459 PM PDT, an area of blowing dust was along a line extending from 22 miles northeast of Nixon to 14 miles west of Trinity Junction to 13 miles north of Fernley, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Less than two miles visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. This area of dust is moving toward I-80 near Trinity Junction. Locations impacted include... Lovelock, Oreana, Trinity Junction, Lovelock Derby Field Airport, Junction I 80 And Nv 396/857 (exit 112), Desert Peak, Junction I 80 And U.S 95 (exit 83), Toulon Peak, Buffalo Mountain, Trinity Peak, and Lone Rock. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust can be hazardous. Delay or reroute travel. Remain aware of the weather.
